Read the most recent simulation report from an output directory

Source: R/report.R
read_latest_report.Rd

Convenience helper to locate and read the latest *_report.txt written by run_spatial_simulation(write_outputs = TRUE) under a given output_dir. Useful for users who want the report text without calling generate_full_report() directly.

Usage

read_latest_report(output_dir = "out")

Arguments

output_dir

Directory to search. If you set OUTPUT_PREFIX in your init file to something like "out/run", pass "out" here (default). The function searches recursively for files matching _report.txt.

Value

A single character scalar containing the report contents.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
txt <- read_latest_report("out")
cat(txt)
} # }
